db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Meta-data is supplementary data describing media. See QMediaMetaData for available meta data attributes.

db:section.db:title: void clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all data from the MediaMetaData object.

db:section.db:title: void insert(Key k, variant value)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a value into a Key: k.

db:section.db:title: bool isEmpty()
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the meta data contains no items: otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: string metaDataKeyToString(Key key)
db:section.db:para: returns a string representation of key that can be used when presenting meta data to users.

db:section.db:title: void remove(Key k)
db:section.db:para: Removes meta data from a Key: k.

db:section.db:title: string stringValue(Key key)
db:section.db:para: Returns the meta data for key key as a QString.
This is mainly meant to simplify presenting the meta data to a user.

db:section.db:title: variant value(Key key)
db:section.db:para: Returns the meta data value for Key key, or a null QVariant if no meta-data for the key is available.
